text: Rashed Radwan is a Spanish film director, producer and writer of Iraqi origin. "Target:Heart of Iraq", "Gaza Genocide" "Human Market" and "Iraq at the Edge of Civil War" are among documentaries Rashed has directed. == Filmography == Ø General and Creative Director, Conflict Films S.L "Heart of Iraq" Ø Commissioned Director “Witness” Al Jazeera English Ø Director “Accidental Hero” (Iraq) Al Jazeera English Ø Director “City of Widows” (Iraq) Al Jazeera English Ø Director “Guardian of Eden” (Iraq) Al Jazeera English Ø Director “Gaza Genocide” (Gaza) Ø Director “Fado Music” (Portugal) Al Jazeera English Ø Director “Tile Theft” (Portugal) Al Jazeera English Ø Director “Fighter in Danger Zone”, (Iraq) Al Jazeera English Ø Director “City of Widows”, (Iraq) Al Jazeera English Ø Director “Guardian of Eden”, (Iraq) Al Jazeera English Ø Director “Lesson in Conflict/Iraq”, Qatar Foundation/AJE Ø Director and Scriptwriter “The death of Al Muthannabi Street” == Awards == * Special Prize of the Jury of Malaga International Film Festival for his movie "Heart of Iraq" * Best Documentary Film, Pamplona Film Festival also for “Heart of Iraq” * Best Documentary Film, “Ojo Cojo” Film Festival, supported by UNESCO == References == ==Sources==
